# PORTS.txt
#
# This comma-separated data file provides information about multiplexer ports
# and what conditions they represent. Entries below include: 
#
# 	CSR_PORT: CSR_PORT number, numeric; "0" means all ports [req]
#	CSR_MSMT_VAR: measurement variable: "Rs", "Rh", or "NEE" [req]
# 	CSR_TREATMENT: "None" or experimental manipulation [req]
#	CSR_AREA: optional chamber area, cm2
#	CSR_DEPTH: optional collar insertion depth, cm
# 	CSR_SPECIES: optional field describing species measured
#	CSR_SENSOR_DEPTHS: optional sensor depths for gradient method
#
CSR_PORT,	CSR_MSMT_VAR,	CSR_TREATMENT,	CSR_PLANTS_REMOVED,	CSR_AREA,	CSR_DEPTH,	CSR_SPECIES
2,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, Sphagnum"		
3,			Rh,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"	
4,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"		
5,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, Sphagnum"	
6,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, lichen"		
9,			Rh,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"		
10,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"	
11,			Rs,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"		
12,			Rh,				None,			TRUE,				2160,		3,			"Picea mariana, feather mosses"
